Services

Please note that pricing information is no longer available from Wi-Fi Alliance. Please contact the laboratories directly for quotes/pricing information. Members can learn more about a laboratory's qualification status by visiting the Certification System.

Cancellation and Postponement Policy

Cancellation policy

Cancellation within 3 - 6 days from scheduled date of lab usage will be charged at 20% of the testing fee. Cancellation under 3 days will be charged at 50% of testing fee.

Postponement policy

Penalties are not applicable if an agreement is signed with Wipro to re-schedule testing within two months after booking the lab by paying the service cost to Wipro. This rescheduling has to be informed to Wipro two weeks before the scheduled date of lab usage. If such agreement cannot be made, cancellation policies will be applied accordingly. The 'Re-scheduling Contract' can only be used ONCE.

Non-attendance policy

Any confirmed customer who fails to attend a scheduled testing and who has not previously notified Wipro will be liable for the entire testing fee.

For more information please visit: https://www.wipro.com/engineeringNXT/wi-fi-testing/
